txt.en:
'Our encampment was made on a hill to the south of here. The Dievlig struck when we were unaware, taking some captive and slaying many. We shall make them pay for their treachery.  

'Will you return to our camp and defeat the Dievlig who attacked our people?

'Travel south-east to the hill and follow the path along the ridge, defeat any Dievlig that you encounter, then return to me.'
'The defeat of the Dievlig on the hill will show their brethren that we will not go quietly from this place. We will defend our right to trade with whom we wish.'
'Defeat the Dievlig who have brought grief upon my party.'
Bledhun's party was attacked and scattered by the Dievlig, wicked Dunlending outcasts dwelling in the Bonevales.
Evil Dunlendings may be found along the path and up the hill south of Bledhun.\n\nBledhun asked you to seek out and defeat the Dievlig that hold the hill.
Talk to Bledhun in the Bonevales
Bledhun awaits you in the north, down the hill.\n\nYou should return to Bledhun and let him know that you have driven back the Dievlig on the hill.
